00681 void help() {
00682  std::cerr << "usage: <program name> <axis size> [<options> <fileName>]\n"
00683            << "options: \n"
00684            << "  -help  to show this help\n"
00685            << std::endl;
00686 }
00687 void show_STEP(const std::string text) {
00688   int len=text.length();
00689   std::cout << "\n" << std::setiosflags(std::ios::left)
00690             << std::setw(len) << std::setfill('=') << "\n" << text 
00691             << std::setw(len) << std::setfill('=') << "\n" << std::endl;
00692 }
00693 
00694 void show_quant(const catalogAccess::Quantity &nQ) {
00695   std::cout << nQ.m_name <<": ucd=\""<< nQ.m_ucd <<"\", type="<< nQ.m_type
00696            <<", unit=\""<< nQ.m_unit <<"\", format=\""<< nQ.m_format
00697           <<"\",\n     index="<< nQ.m_index
00698          <<", boolGeneric="<< nQ.m_isGeneric <<", boolNaN="<< nQ.m_rejectNaN
00699         <<"\n     selectList sizes=("<< nQ.m_listValN.size() <<" num, "
00700        << nQ.m_listValS.size() <<" str), cuts=" << nQ.m_lowerCut <<" to "
00701       << nQ.m_upperCut << "\ncomment=\""<< nQ.m_comment << "\"" << std::endl;
00702 }
00703 void show_string(const std::string name, const std::string val) {
00704   std::cout << "Quantity " << name << ": \"" << val <<"\""<< std::endl; 
00705 }
00706 void show_double(const std::string name, const double val) {
00707   std::cout << "Quantity " << name << " = " //<< std::setprecision(4)
00708 //            << val << std::endl;
00709             << std::setiosflags(outDouble) << std::setprecision(3)
00710             << std::setw(11) << std::setfill(' ')
00711             << val << std::resetiosflags(outDouble) << std::endl;
00712 }
